attributes.action: Stop the excavation at al-Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The location houses the al-Aqsa mosque, the third holiest shrine in Islam, and is revered by Jews as the site of their Biblical temples. We as British muslims would like the prime minster to put pressure on the government of Isreal to stop such work which would anger Muslims and Jews across the world if the excavation goes ahead.If such work is carried out at Al-Asqsa it will damage the overall structure of the Mosque.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the excavation at al-Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15009.asp

Prime Minister's Office
